details:
adjective
- darkened with overcast
= synonyms: dull
- lacking lightness or liveliness
= synonyms: heavy
- (of movement) slow and laborious
= example: (of movement) slow and laborious
= synonyms: plodding
- made heavy or weighted down with weariness
= example: made heavy or weighted down with weariness
= synonyms: weighted
- made of lead
= example: made of lead
